channel.title: Interleaved RSS Feed
channel.description: This is an interleaved feed of the most recent entries from each RSS source, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Book Review: The New World Economy in 5 Trends
item.description: A diligent economist and an eclectic bookworm serve up an analysis of megatrends that will have the greatest impact on economies and investments: innovation, productivity, climate, multiglobalization, debt, and aging.

item.title: Ferrari 296 GTS Hybrid Review: ‘Arresting, uncanny beauty’ with $366,139 price tag
item.description: As Ferrari rolls toward its first all-electric car, arriving next year, it makes sense that it would also make a hybrid or two.

item.title: Factor Strategies Belong in Your Completion Portfolio Toolkit
item.description: Why wouldn't you include factor strategies in your completion portfolio? A review of the two commonly used approaches for managing institutional assets highlights their symbiotic nature.

item.title: Janet Yellen warns higher outlook for rates will make it harder to keep deficits and debt expenses under control
item.description: The White House sees 10-year Treasury yields at 3.7% in the early 2030s — almost a full percentage point higher than three years ago.

item.title: For the Analyst: Peer Benchmarking Methods to Improve Earnings Forecasts
item.description: Peer benchmarking is a vexing task for financial analysts but one that is critical for forecasting earnings. This straightforward measure can help find peers for relative performance, compensation, and valuation benchmarking.

item.title: Could drugs like Ozempic and Wegovy help people live longer? Some experts see them as potential longevity pills
item.description: “The singular most effective and consistent way of extending lifespan in animals is caloric restriction.”

item.title: Building LLMs in the Open-Source Community: A Call to Action for Investment Professionals
item.description: Large language models like ChatGPT are changing the way we think about investing and reshaping roles in the investment profession.

item.title: Tesla shareholders should reject Elon Musk’s ‘excessive’ pay package, proxy advisor says, noting ‘extraordinarily time-consuming projects’ unrelated to EV maker
item.description: “Mr. Musk’s slate of extraordinarily time-consuming projects unrelated to the Company was well-documented before the 2018 grant, and only expanded with his high-profile purchase of the company now known as X,” said Glass Lewis.

item.title: Sustainability Reporting: Navigating Assurance Practices
item.description: Don't be lulled into a false sense of security by the word "assurance" when evaluating sustainability reports. Assurance practices vary, and investors would be wise to learn more about the different levels of coverage.

item.title: Top assassin for the Sinaloa drug cartel, once described as ‘a complete psychopath’ with long history of gruesome acts, is extradited to U.S.
item.description: Nestor Isidro Pérez Salas, also known as “El Nini,” is a leader of a group that provided security for the sons of imprisoned drug lord Joaquín “El Chapo” Guzmán, federal investigators said.
